const cmat *  Hol 
) [static]

With given open loop transfer function, compute its cross over frequency and phase margin.

Written: 2010-06-11

Tested OK: 2010-06-11

Parameters:

[out] nu frequency grid
[in] Hol open loop transfer function defined on nu
